summary: Test suite that validates the integration of Vertex AI (including Gemini models) with the LLM translation library, covering schema construction, function calling, image MIME handling, log‑prob extraction, multiple function calls, embedding retrieval, and tool parameter translation.
business_intent: Guarantee that Vertex AI based language model features work correctly within the translation framework, ensuring reliable AI‑driven functionality such as function calls, image processing, and embeddings for downstream applications.
